changeSet.comment: fill in the table "device_notifications" with test data
changeSet.sql: WITH series AS (SELECT GENERATE_SERIES(1, 1000) sery) INSERT INTO device_notifications (delivered, inserted_date_at_utc, updated_date_at_utc, device_id, alert_id) SELECT CASE WHEN s.sery % 5 = 0 THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END, NOW() - FLOOR((RANDOM() * (1000 - 500) + 500)) * INTERVAL '1 day', NOW() - FLOOR((RANDOM() * (499 - 1) + 1)) * INTERVAL '1 day', FLOOR(RANDOM() * ((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DEVICES) - 1) + 1), FLOOR(RANDOM() * ((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ALERTS) - 1) + 1) FROM series s
